name: albuquerque
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the US state of New Mexico: His family moved to Albuquerque when he was nine years old. The office is located in the centre of Albuquerque. It shows Albuquerque residents are more aware of their rights and feel more comfortable voicing their concerns. The four-day workshop will take place at the University of New Mexico in Albuquerque.
More examplesFewer examplesIn Albuquerque, pay raises moved quickly last year. He was in Albuquerque last year when he was hit by a car on Central.Some Albuquerque hoteliers say the market is overbuilt and new hotels like this one only make it tougher to compete.
